info.description: Meta File System Upload Service API, provides file upload functionality
info.title: Meta File System Uploader API

get.description: Get upload service configuration information, including max file size and swagger base URL

post.description: Upload large file by splitting it into chunks, build transactions for chunks and index, optionally broadcast all transactions in order
Create an async chunked upload task and return the task ID so the client can poll for progress

200.description: Upload successful, return transaction ID and Pin ID

400.description: Parameter error or file not found

post.description: Upload file and add MetaID OP_RETURN output to existing PreTxHex, then broadcast immediately. This is a one-step upload process that combines building and broadcasting. Supports UTXO merge transaction for SIGHASH_SINGLE compatibility.

parameters.description: Pre-transaction hex (signed, with inputs and outputs)
parameters.name: preTxHex

parameters.description: Merge transaction hex (optional, broadcasted before main transaction)
parameters.name: mergeTxHex

parameters.description: Address (also used as change address if changeAddress is not provided)
parameters.name: address

parameters.description: Total input amount in satoshis (optional, for automatic change calculation)
parameters.name: totalInputAmount

200.description: Upload successful, return transaction ID and Pin ID

post.description: Estimate the fee required for chunked file upload, including chunk count and fees for ChunkPreTxHex and IndexPreTxHex
Abort a multipart upload session and clean up resources
Complete a multipart upload session and merge all parts into a single file
Start a multipart upload session for large file uploads with resume support
List all uploaded parts in a multipart upload session for resume support
Upload a single part of the file in a multipart upload session
Upload file and generate unsigned transaction, return transaction for client signing

200.description: Pre-upload successful, return transaction and file info

get.description: Get async upload task progress and status by task ID
List chunked upload tasks for a given address with cursor-based pagination

chunkPreTxFee.description: Total funding required for chunk transactions

indexPreTxFee.description: Funding required for the index transaction
